description:
stack@devstack002:~/devstack$ nova keypair-add
usage: nova keypair-add [--pub_key <pub_key>] <name>
error: too few arguments
Try `nova keypair-add help' for more information.


But calling "nova keypair-add help" creates a new key with the name help. Just a very little one.. ;)

stack@devstack002:~/devstack$ nova keypair-add help
-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
MIICXQIBAAKBgQC+zdzMxb9JtpC9qtHk/KQhogVUP4NhoRh/6LOQ0J3ecwlT0NsA
rJTy/L5yYHlH/WPhhTUUHXTJbRMaRWbZBNZa3oKnui6g/qpbI8BGkAvuEn8kAMF3
[...]
title: little bug in usage information of 'nova keypair-add'

comments.content:
stack@devstack002:~/devstack$ nova keypair-add
usage: nova keypair-add [--pub_key <pub_key>] <name>
error: too few arguments
Try `nova keypair-add help' for more information.


But calling "nova keypair-add help" creates a new key with the name help. Just a very little one.. ;)

stack@devstack002:~/devstack$ nova keypair-add help
-----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY-----
MIICXQIBAAKBgQC+zdzMxb9JtpC9qtHk/KQhogVUP4NhoRh/6LOQ0J3ecwlT0NsA
rJTy/L5yYHlH/WPhhTUUHXTJbRMaRWbZBNZa3oKnui6g/qpbI8BGkAvuEn8kAMF3
[...]
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~berendt

comments.content:
Hmm. I think the information is wrong for all commands and should be:

Try `nova help keypair-add' for more information.



stack@devstack002:~/devstack$ nova keypair-delete
usage: nova keypair-delete <name>
error: too few arguments
Try `nova keypair-delete help' for more information.
stack@devstack002:~/devstack$ nova keypair-delete help
The server has either erred or is incapable of performing the requested operation. (HTTP 500)
stack@devstack002:~/devstack$ nova help keypair-delete
usage: nova keypair-delete <name>

Delete keypair by its id

Positional arguments:
  <name>  Keypair name to delete.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~berendt

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/3459
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
